title: >>> SEPTEMBER 6
body_text:
The SEPTEMBER SIX-MAN WAR!
Marzarella, Lewis, Turner VERSUS Smalls, Pellecchia, Basista
It's only fitting that the inaugural clash of the unprecedented third year features six of the absolute best the game has to offer. On one side, the crafty veterans
PondScum
reunite, who will stop at nothing to conquer their opposition. But three young, gifted stallions stand in their way, each with a heart of gold and desire to achieve.
The Rivalry
The blocking specialist Ray Marzarella seeks revenge in this heated contest as the reckless Sascha Basista bested the
PondScum
icon in early July 2007. Can Ray rebound from his devastating loss at
DODGEBALL NINETY 4
? Or will Basista with partners at hand defeat the mighty challenge ahead?
The Wild Cards
Big, bad Gerald "G-Money" Lewis and prodigy Rob Pellecchia were both added to the equation in the minutes following DODGEBALL 102. What will these recognized stars bring to the table?
Men in the Middle
Perhaps the most controversial competitor in the sport's history, the one and only Dan Turner, certainly adds a dimension of curiosity and overall anticipation for this upcoming attraction. After all, without his antagonizing antics and ability to stir up trouble, the
Invasion of LX3
may have never become one of the most infamous occurrences ever recorded. What in God's name could he possibly have up his sleeve this time around?
The colorfully dressed, athletically blessed Joey Smalls undeniably boosts match hype and preparation. A gutsy competitor with unlimited potential challenges himself each and every time. And it's that unparalleled enthusiasm and electricity his peers will feel, using that positive energy in a successful direction.
Don't be surprised to see these two warriors emerge as the leaders of their respective combinations. They are more than capable that is for sure.
________________________________________
_____________
Still to Come in
Season 11
...
DODGEBALL 104: September 15
(Match currently in the works)
DOVER Taken OVER 2: September 22
DODGEBALL 105: September 29
Feared superpowers finally collide in their long-awaited return match from DODGEBALL 70! Powerhouse
Chris Adams
will do battle with the equally imposing
Kevin Fitzpatrick
contested under
CREAMation Rules
!
DODGEBALL 106: October 6
The magical extravaganza that was DODGEBALL 96 comes back to life in this 106th spectacular.
Juan Londono
faces
Rob Avakian
in this soon-to-be classic rematch.
DODGEBALL 107: October 13
The final chapter in this storied rivalry?
WALL v. ALL 3
.
DODGEBALL 108: October 20
(Match currently in the works)
DODGEBALL 109: October 27
(Match currently in the works)
DODGEBALL 110: November 3
The writer of dodgeball can hardly wait for the bombshell announcement regarding the Season 11 finale.
body_html:
The SEPTEMBER SIX-MAN WAR!
Marzarella, Lewis, Turner VERSUS Smalls, Pellecchia, Basista

It's only fitting that the inaugural clash of the unprecedented third year features six of the absolute best the game has to offer. On one side, the crafty veterans PondScum reunite, who will stop at nothing to conquer their opposition. But three young, gifted stallions stand in their way, each with a heart of gold and desire to achieve.

The Rivalry
The blocking specialist Ray Marzarella seeks revenge in this heated contest as the reckless Sascha Basista bested the PondScum icon in early July 2007. Can Ray rebound from his devastating loss at DODGEBALL NINETY 4? Or will Basista with partners at hand defeat the mighty challenge ahead?

The Wild Cards
Big, bad Gerald "G-Money" Lewis and prodigy Rob Pellecchia were both added to the equation in the minutes following DODGEBALL 102. What will these recognized stars bring to the table?

Men in the Middle
Perhaps the most controversial competitor in the sport's history, the one and only Dan Turner, certainly adds a dimension of curiosity and overall anticipation for this upcoming attraction. After all, without his antagonizing antics and ability to stir up trouble, the Invasion of LX3 may have never become one of the most infamous occurrences ever recorded. What in God's name could he possibly have up his sleeve this time around?

The colorfully dressed, athletically blessed Joey Smalls undeniably boosts match hype and preparation. A gutsy competitor with unlimited potential challenges himself each and every time. And it's that unparalleled enthusiasm and electricity his peers will feel, using that positive energy in a successful direction.

Don't be surprised to see these two warriors emerge as the leaders of their respective combinations. They are more than capable that is for sure.
_____________________________________________________

Still to Come in Season 11 ...


DODGEBALL 104: September 15
(Match currently in the works)

DOVER Taken OVER 2: September 22

DODGEBALL 105: September 29
Feared superpowers finally collide in their long-awaited return match from DODGEBALL 70! Powerhouse Chris Adams will do battle with the equally imposing Kevin Fitzpatrick contested under CREAMation Rules!

DODGEBALL 106: October 6
The magical extravaganza that was DODGEBALL 96 comes back to life in this 106th spectacular. Juan Londono faces Rob Avakian in this soon-to-be classic rematch.

DODGEBALL 107: October 13
The final chapter in this storied rivalry? WALL v. ALL 3.

DODGEBALL 108: October 20
(Match currently in the works)

DODGEBALL 109: October 27
(Match currently in the works)

DODGEBALL 110: November 3
The writer of dodgeball can hardly wait for the bombshell announcement regarding the Season 11 finale.
